text: jnat 'iiqamat dayimat liladhin awrthhm allah kitabah yuhllawn fiha alasawr min aldhahab wallwlw, walibasuhum almetad fi aljanat harir ay: thiab rqyq. waqaluu hin dakhaluu aljnt: alhamd lilah aladhi 'adhhab eanaa kl hazan, 'iina rabana lghfwr; hayth ghafar lana alzlat, shkwr; hayth qabl minaa alhasanat wdaefha. wahu aladhi anzlana dar aljanat min fdlh, la yamasuna fiha teb wala 'ieya'
